snippet: RUBIN--Linda. We mourn the loss of our beloved Linda, a unique, fun, charming, dramatic, rebellious, quirky and loyal woman who was a devoted wife to Mickey, loving mother to Rick, wonderful aunt and friend. We will miss and remember you always. Rest in peace. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RUBIN--Linda. We mourn the loss of our beloved Linda, a unique, fun, charming, dramatic, rebellious, quirky and loyal woman who was a devoted wife to Mickey, loving mother to Rick, wonderful aunt and friend. We will miss and remember you always. Rest in peace. 1/3
